position: maintenance, and modification of production equipment
description: Assisted in the fabrication, maintenance, and modification of production equipment. Involved in machine repairs, piping installations, and supporting the improvement of production line efficiency through mechanical and process engineering tasks.

company: Islamic Religious Education State Senior High School 13 Semarang
description: Islamic Spiritual Extracurricular (ROHIS) is an organization engaged in the religious field as a form of self-development and extracurricular activities at SMAN 13 Semarang. In addition to improving the quality of faith / piety of students, Rohis SMAN 13 Semarang was formed in order to respond to the rapid progress of information and communication technology, so that students are expected to be able to avoid the influence of globalization that leads to reprehensible acts such as: free association, drug use and glamorous / luxurious lifestyles..
